sub_topic: Probability of a certain outcome in a sports game
message_1: In a basketball game between the Lakers and the Warriors, the probability of the Lakers winning is 0.6. If you place a bet on the Lakers, what is the probability that you will win?
message_2: If the probability of the Lakers winning is 0.6, then the probability of you winning your bet when you place it on the Lakers is also 0.6.
